summary:
My first mod ever ;) (Improvement suggestions welcome)

Eye textures in 1024x1024. I changed now only 13 eye models (only Human). The rest comes in a few days.
descriptionHtml:
My first mod  ;) (Improvement suggestions welcome)

Eye textures in 1024x1024. I changed only 13 eye models now (only Human). The rest comes in a few days. 

Changed Textures:
1024x1024

eyeyellow
eyewerewolf
eyesiceblue
eyesdarkblue
eyelightgrey
eyehazelbrown
eyehazel
eyegrey
eyegreen
eyebrown
eyeblue
eyeblind
eyeamber

Installation:

Copy the content in that folder into your Data folder (usually: program files/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data) and overwrite if prompted!

Uninstall:

Just delete the textures from the folder (Data/Texture/Actors/character/eyes)

Thanks Bethesda for another great game and the whole modding community for the inspiration.
author: PrinzPunk
